channel.title: Need easy help
channel.description: ok want to make it that few items would have same timers how should i add them i know that || is needed but i dont know how to add it correcly cuz when i try to add it my way i get operator || cannot be applied to int.boolean so please some one tell me how to type it correcly srry for bad english

item.title: Need easy help
item.dc:creator: @judgechaos judgechaos
item.description:
@judgechaos wrote:

return part is the action example u want a sara sword to hit like a dark light spec… just find the getattackanim area of ur client.java and find and add that code…for example

if(id == 15351)
{
return 2890;

if u want several weps in to get same thing do this

if(id == 15351 ||id == 15333 ||id == 15334 ||id == 15335 ||id == 15336) { return 2890;

simple

Read full topic
